text: Jumpei Furuya is a Japanese triathlete. In 2018, he won the gold medal in the men's triathlon at the 2018 Asian Games in Jakarta, Indonesia. He also won the gold medal in the mixed relay event. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Japanese male triathletes Category:Asian Games medalists in triathlon Category:Triathletes at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Jumpei Furuya
